query.name: org.psugcal.ps8.school.headsup_calendar_days
query.sql:
SELECT distinct calendar_day.id, calendar_day.dcid, calendar_day.date_value, calendar_day.insession, calendar_day.note, calendar_day.bell_schedule_id, calendar_day.schoolid FROM calendar_day WHERE calendar_day.schoolid = :school_id_in AND calendar_day.date_value >= TO_DATE(:start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')AND calendar_day.date_value <= TO_DATE(:end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY calendar_day.date_value

query.name: org.psugcal.ps8.school.headsup_section_meetings
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT teachers.last_name, teachers.lastfirst, teachers.email_addr, courses.course_name, terms.abbreviation as term_name, section_meeting.meeting as code, section_meeting.period_number, section_meeting.cycle_day_letter, sections.schoolid, sections.id, sections.dcid, sections.no_of_students, period.abbreviation, bell_schedule_items.start_time, bell_schedule_items.end_time FROM sections, teachers, terms, courses, section_meeting, period, bell_schedule_items WHERE terms.dcid = :termdcid AND sections.schoolid = :schoolid AND section_meeting.sectionid = sections.id AND sections.teacher = teachers.id AND sections.termid = terms.id AND sections.course_number = courses.course_number AND period.period_number = section_meeting.period_number AND bell_schedule_items.period_id = period.id AND bell_schedule_items.bell_schedule_id = :bell_schedule_id ORDER BY sections.id, teachers.lastfirst, section_meeting.period_number

query.name: org.psugcal.ps8.school.headsup_blocks
query.sql:
SELECT distinct period.abbreviation, period.period_number, bell_schedule_items.start_time, bell_schedule_items.end_time, bell_schedule_items.bell_schedule_id, calendar_day.schoolid, calendar_day.id as calendar_day_id, calendar_day.dcid as calendar_day_dcid
FROM bell_schedule_items, period, bell_schedule, calendar_day
WHERE calendar_day.dcid = :calendar_day_dcid_in AND period.id=bell_schedule_items.period_id AND bell_schedule.id=bell_schedule_items.bell_schedule_id AND calendar_day.bell_schedule_id=bell_schedule.id AND calendar_day.schoolid = :school_id ORDER BY period.period_number

query.name: org.psugcal.ps8.school.headsup_roster
query.sql:
SELECT students.dcid, students.id, students.last_name, students.first_name, students.lastfirst, students.grade_level, psm_studentcontact.email, sections.dcid as sections_dcid, sections.id as sections_id FROM cc INNER JOIN sections ON cc.sectionid = sections.id INNER JOIN students ON cc.studentid = students.id JOIN sync_studentmap on sync_studentmap.studentsdcid = students.dcid JOIN psm_studentcontact ON psm_studentcontact.studentid = sync_studentmap.studentid
WHERE sections.dcid = :section_dcid AND psm_studentcontact.studentcontacttypeid=21633 ORDER BY students.lastfirst, students.dcid
